scripts.package-content: webpack-cli --config content-webpack-config.js && copy dist\content.pack.js public && copy dist\content.pack.js.map public
scripts.package-popup: webpack-cli --config popup-webpack-config.js && copy dist\popup.pack.js public && copy dist\popup.pack.js.map public
scripts.package-all: npm run compile npm run build-content-package && npm run build-popup-package
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build
